data.eml:eml: Current knowledge on Mexican tardigrades with a description of Milnesium cassandrae sp. nov. (Eutardigrada: Milnesiidae) and discussion on the taxonomic value of dorsal pseudoplates in the genus Milnesium Doyère, 1840

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Moreno, Antonio, Roszkowska, Milena, García, Mario Alberto, Flores, José Juan, Kaczmarek, Łukasz (2019): Current knowledge on Mexican tardigrades with a description of Milnesium cassandrae sp. nov. (Eutardigrada: Milnesiidae) and discussion on the taxonomic value of dorsal pseudoplates in the genus Milnesium Doyère, 1840. Zootaxa 4691 (5): 501-524, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4691.5.5
